pages.text: Welcome to a new world with Alloygery!$(br2)Alloygery changes the way you play the first couple of nights, so here is what you need to know to get started.$(br2)First, you will need a pickaxe. So go punch a tree and come back here when you have a Stone Pickaxe.

Congratulations on crafting a Stone Pickaxe! As great as this pickaxe is, it will not be able to mine iron. $(br2)For that you will need a $(item)Bronze Pickaxe$() or better. $(br2)Bronze is an alloy of copper and tin, and needs to be smelted in an $(l:block_alloy_kiln)Alloy Kiln$().
If you want to mine iron, then it is time to make some bronze$()! $(br2)To do this, smelt 3 copper and 1 tin in an $(l:block_alloy_kiln)Alloy Kiln$().
Once you have bronze, you can craft a Bronze Pickaxe which is capable of mining iron ore.

Congratulations on crafting a Bronze Pickaxe! With this new tool, you can mine iron to your hearts content! $(br2)Once you get into the $(italics)Iron Age$() things get interesting, so be sure to check back here once you have some iron.

Welcome to the Iron Age! $(br2)Tools made from iron or better need to be crafted with a tool head, a binding, and a handle. Some $(l:part_handle)Handles$() and $(l:part_binding)Bindings$() can be crafted at the Crafting Table, but tool heads need to be crafted at the $(l:block_smithing_anvil)Smithing Anvil$().
Craft and place a Smithing Anvil to get started making better tools
In order to craft iron tool parts at the $(l:block_smithing_anvil)Smithing Anvil$() you will need a Crafting Hammer.

pages.title: Part Crafting
pages.text: Use a $(thing)Crafting Hammer$() and $(item)Iron Ingots$() to craft an $(item)Iron Pickaxe Head$()

pages.title: Tool Crafting
pages.text: Next, take your $(thing)Iron Pickaxe Head$() and combine it with any $(l:part_handle)handle$(), and any $(l:part_binding)binding$(), to create an $(item)Iron Pickaxe$().

pages.title: Further Reading
pages.text: More advanced alloys are made at the $(l:alloygery:block_blast_alloy_kiln)Blast Alloy Kiln$(). $(br2)And be sure to check out the $(l:alloygery:block_smithing_table)Smithing Table$() to add valuable upgrades to your tools!
